abilities.name: Distortion Door
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, put 1 damage counter on 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Impact
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on 1 of your Pokémon.
